price: (1) [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away.
arabic: ٱقۡتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مُّعۡرِضُونَ
